thumb.name: Big Warm Hug
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EGrandpa and Grandma Kwan.%3Cbr%3Eif more grandparents were like you.%3Cbr%3Ethere'd be a lot more happy kids.%3Cbr%3Ea lot more puppy tails wagging.%3Cbr%3Emore sunshine and stories told.%3Cbr%3Eand more stars wished upon...%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EThere would be more smilesto go around.%3Cbr%3Emore 'once-upon-a-times' and giggles.%3Cbr%3Eand a whole lot more reasons%3Cbr%3Eto thank God for His gift of family.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EIn fact. life would be%3Cbr%3Eone big warm hug!

thumb.name: Special Grandparents Add-a-Photo
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3EFor Nana and Grandad.%3Cbr%3EMy Wonderful Grandparents%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E'Thinking of special grandparents%3Cbr%3Efills my heart with joy!'%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3EBecause you're thought of lovingly%3Cbr%3EMore often than you know.%3Cbr%3EThis greeting comes on Grandparents Day%3Cbr%3Eto warmly tell you so!%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EHappy Grandparents Day%3Cbr%3E
